metadata.name: THE BOLT
metadata.description:
1/1 Only one of its kind.  
Designed and Made Individually by hand in Los Angeles

This is the digital representation of the exclusive heart bolt that is hand pressed on recycled denim, hand-cut, and sewn onto the front foam crown of the cap.  There are 4 panels of mesh on the back with our heart patch hand sewn on the right side of the hatâ€”structured and high profile with the bill stiff and pre-curved. The Barcode patch is sewn on the back of the cap above the snap back.
